query.name: cancelCode
query.description: If not null, then will do alarm in DG.

common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/digital/order/alterStatus')
request.add_api_parameter("requestId", "1234")
request.add_api_parameter("transactionId", "1234")
request.add_api_parameter("sellerId", "1234")
request.add_api_parameter("cancelCode", "1234")
request.add_api_parameter("cancelMsg", "1234")
request.add_api_parameter("userToken", "6gaQ5mBV7lHiw1vI0IqhEw==")
request.add_api_parameter("serviceName", "agaming")
response = client.execute(request)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/digital/order/alterStatus')
request.add_api_param('requestId', '1234')
request.add_api_param('transactionId', '1234')
request.add_api_param('sellerId', '1234')
request.add_api_param('cancelCode', '1234')
request.add_api_param('cancelMsg', '1234')
request.add_api_param('userToken', '6gaQ5mBV7lHiw1vI0IqhEw==')
request.add_api_param('serviceName', 'agaming')
response = client.execute(request)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)

schema.name: orderStatus
schema.description: If have, then order final status.
